name: Flesh And Bones (Bullhead Studios)
description:
WARNING. This game has adult themes, blood, gore, violence and swearing. Please enjoy!

Created for the Themed Horror Game Jam, developed by Bullhead Grantsville

As a member of Zions Branch, an elite private military corporation, you will join the race for a $5,000,000 bounty of the famed serial killer, Icepick.  Expect heavy resistance from other PMCs and even the Freed States of America as we close in on an early retirement.

Features six levels

Intense battles

Chilling atmosphere

And more...

Special thanks to M3t4p0w3r for the in game tracks!
